title.rendered: Tom Cruise FLIPS OUT on Set of Mission: Impossible 7

content.rendered:
NOTE TO SELF:

Do not anger Tom Cruise.

The veteran actor was caught on tape in December 2020, going absolutely bananas on a pair of staffers on the set of Mission: Impossible 7.

He blew hsi gasket over these people allegedly violating COVID-19 protocol — and it was awesome!

Go Tom, you know?

Listen to his viral rant now!

excerpt.rendered: NOTE TO SELF: Do not anger Tom Cruise. The veteran actor was caught on tape in December 2020, going absolutely bananas …
